colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI THU SHI YI GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BYA BA'I 'BANGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS, ,PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO ZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE BA NI DGE BSGOS BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
